description: Engineering Manager view of code quality across the portfolio

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest AS (
  SELECT project_key, metric_key, metric_value,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY project_key, metric_key ORDER BY recorded_at DESC) as rn
  FROM sonarqube_metrics WHERE metric_key IN ('reliability_rating', 'security_rating', 'sqale_rating')
),
project_gates AS (
  SELECT project_key,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'reliability_rating' THEN metric_value END) as reliability,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'security_rating' THEN metric_value END) as security,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'sqale_rating' THEN metric_value END) as maintainability
  FROM latest WHERE rn = 1 GROUP BY project_key
)
SELECT 
  ROUND((100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE reliability <= 2 AND security <= 2 AND maintainability <= 2) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0))::numeric, 1) as value
FROM project_gates;

panels.title: Quality Gate Pass Rate
panels.description: Percentage of projects passing all quality gates (reliability, security, maintainability rated A or B). Target: >90%

panels.title: Critical Security Issues
panels.description: Number of projects with security rating D or E. These require immediate attention to address vulnerabilities

panels.title: Total Tech Debt
panels.description: Cumulative technical debt across all projects measured in days of effort to remediate

panels.title: Avg Test Coverage
panels.description: Average test coverage across all projects. Industry target is 80%. Below 60% indicates significant risk

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT project_key) as value FROM sonarqube_projects;

panels.title: Total Projects
panels.description: Number of projects configured in SonarQube and being tracked for code quality

targets.rawSql:
WITH current_bugs AS (
  SELECT SUM(metric_value) as total
  FROM sonarqube_metrics
  WHERE metric_key = 'bugs'
    AND recorded_at = (SELECT MAX(recorded_at) FROM sonarqube_metrics)
),
week_ago_bugs AS (
  SELECT SUM(metric_value) as total
  FROM sonarqube_metrics
  WHERE metric_key = 'bugs'
    AND recorded_at = (
      SELECT MAX(recorded_at) FROM sonarqube_metrics 
      WHERE recorded_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
    )
)
SELECT COALESCE(c.total, 0) - COALESCE(w.total, 0) as "7d Bug Delta"
FROM current_bugs c, week_ago_bugs w;

panels.title: 7-Day Bug Delta
panels.description: Change in total bugs over past 7 days. Green = decreasing, Red = increasing

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest AS (
  SELECT project_key, metric_value,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY project_key ORDER BY recorded_at DESC) as rn
  FROM sonarqube_metrics WHERE metric_key = 'reliability_rating'
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN metric_value = 1 THEN 'A'
    WHEN metric_value = 2 THEN 'B'
    WHEN metric_value = 3 THEN 'C'
    WHEN metric_value = 4 THEN 'D'
    ELSE 'E'
  END as rating,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM latest WHERE rn = 1
GROUP BY rating ORDER BY rating;

panels.title: Reliability Rating
panels.description: Distribution by reliability rating. A=0 bugs, B=minor, C=major, D=critical, E=blocker bugs

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest AS (
  SELECT project_key, metric_value,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY project_key ORDER BY recorded_at DESC) as rn
  FROM sonarqube_metrics WHERE metric_key = 'security_rating'
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN metric_value = 1 THEN 'A'
    WHEN metric_value = 2 THEN 'B'
    WHEN metric_value = 3 THEN 'C'
    WHEN metric_value = 4 THEN 'D'
    ELSE 'E'
  END as rating,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM latest WHERE rn = 1
GROUP BY rating ORDER BY rating;

panels.title: Security Rating
panels.description: Distribution by security rating. A=0 vulns, B=minor, C=major, D=critical, E=blocker vulns

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest AS (
  SELECT project_key, metric_value,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY project_key ORDER BY recorded_at DESC) as rn
  FROM sonarqube_metrics WHERE metric_key = 'sqale_rating'
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN metric_value = 1 THEN 'A'
    WHEN metric_value = 2 THEN 'B'
    WHEN metric_value = 3 THEN 'C'
    WHEN metric_value = 4 THEN 'D'
    ELSE 'E'
  END as rating,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM latest WHERE rn = 1
GROUP BY rating ORDER BY rating;

panels.title: Maintainability Rating
panels.description: Distribution by maintainability. Based on debt ratio: A≤5%, B≤10%, C≤20%, D≤50%, E>50%

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE(recorded_at) as time,
  SUM(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'bugs' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) as "Bugs",
  SUM(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'vulnerabilities' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) as "Vulnerabilities",
  SUM(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'code_smells' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) / 100 as "Code Smells (100s)"
FROM sonarqube_metrics
WHERE metric_key IN ('bugs', 'vulnerabilities', 'code_smells')
  AND $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
GROUP BY DATE(recorded_at)
ORDER BY time;

panels.title: Total Issues Trend
panels.description: Historical trend of bugs, vulnerabilities, and code smells. Downward trends indicate improvement

targets.rawSql:
WITH daily_debt AS (
  SELECT 
    DATE(recorded_at) as day,
    SUM(metric_value) / 480.0 as total_debt_days
  FROM sonarqube_metrics
  WHERE metric_key = 'sqale_index'
    AND $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
  GROUP BY DATE(recorded_at)
)
SELECT 
  day as time,
  ROUND((total_debt_days - LAG(total_debt_days) OVER (ORDER BY day))::numeric, 2) as "Debt Delta (days)"
FROM daily_debt
ORDER BY day;

panels.title: Tech Debt Velocity
panels.description: Daily change in technical debt. Positive = accumulating debt, Negative = paying down debt

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE(recorded_at) as time,
  ROUND(AVG(metric_value)::numeric, 1) as "Avg Coverage",
  ROUND(MIN(metric_value)::numeric, 1) as "Min Coverage",
  ROUND(MAX(metric_value)::numeric, 1) as "Max Coverage"
FROM sonarqube_metrics
WHERE metric_key = 'coverage'
  AND $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
GROUP BY DATE(recorded_at)
ORDER BY time;

panels.title: Test Coverage Trend
panels.description: Average, min, and max test coverage over time. Red zone indicates coverage below 80% target

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE(recorded_at) as time,
  ROUND(AVG(metric_value)::numeric, 1) as "Avg Duplication %"
FROM sonarqube_metrics
WHERE metric_key = 'duplicated_lines_density'
  AND $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
GROUP BY DATE(recorded_at)
ORDER BY time;

panels.title: Code Duplication Trend
panels.description: Percentage of duplicated lines over time. Lower is better - high duplication increases maintenance burden

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    project_key, metric_key, metric_value,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY project_key, metric_key ORDER BY recorded_at DESC) as rn
  FROM sonarqube_metrics
),
pivoted AS (
  SELECT 
    project_key,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'bugs' THEN metric_value END) as bugs,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'vulnerabilities' THEN metric_value END) as vulnerabilities,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'code_smells' THEN metric_value END) as code_smells,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'coverage' THEN metric_value END) as coverage,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'ncloc' THEN metric_value END) as lines_of_code,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'sqale_index' THEN metric_value END) / 480.0 as debt_days,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'reliability_rating' THEN metric_value END) as reliability,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'security_rating' THEN metric_value END) as security,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_key = 'sqale_rating' THEN metric_value END) as maintainability
  FROM latest_metrics WHERE rn = 1
  GROUP BY project_key
)
SELECT 
  p.project_name,
  ROUND(pv.bugs::numeric) as bugs,
  ROUND(pv.vulnerabilities::numeric) as vulnerabilities,
  ROUND(pv.coverage::numeric, 1) as coverage,
  ROUND(pv.debt_days::numeric, 1) as debt_days,
  pv.reliability::int as reliability,
  pv.security::int as security,
  pv.maintainability::int as maintainability,
  ROUND(pv.lines_of_code::numeric) as lines_of_code,
  ROUND((
    COALESCE(pv.bugs, 0) * 3 + 
    COALESCE(pv.vulnerabilities, 0) * 5 + 
    GREATEST(0, 80 - COALESCE(pv.coverage, 0)) * 0.5 +
    COALESCE(pv.debt_days, 0) * 0.5
  )::numeric, 1) as risk_score
FROM sonarqube_projects p
JOIN pivoted pv ON p.project_key = pv.project_key
WHERE pv.bugs IS NOT NULL OR pv.vulnerabilities IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY risk_score DESC
LIMIT 30;

panels.title: Projects by Risk Score
panels.description: Projects ranked by risk (bugs×3 + vulns×5 + coverage_gap×0.5 + debt×0.5). Higher score = more attention needed

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    project_key, metric_key, metric_value,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY project_key, metric_key ORDER BY recorded_at DESC) as rn
  FROM sonarqube_metrics
)
SELECT 
  p.project_name,
  MAX(CASE WHEN lm.metric_key = 'bugs' THEN lm.metric_value END) as bugs,
  MAX(CASE WHEN lm.metric_key = 'vulnerabilities' THEN lm.metric_value END) as vulnerabilities,
  MAX(CASE WHEN lm.metric_key = 'code_smells' THEN lm.metric_value END) as code_smells,
  MAX(CASE WHEN lm.metric_key = 'coverage' THEN lm.metric_value END) as coverage,
  MAX(CASE WHEN lm.metric_key = 'duplicated_lines_density' THEN lm.metric_value END) as duplication,
  MAX(CASE WHEN lm.metric_key = 'ncloc' THEN lm.metric_value END) as lines_of_code,
  ROUND((MAX(CASE WHEN lm.metric_key = 'sqale_index' THEN lm.metric_value END) / 60.0)::numeric, 1) as debt_hours
FROM sonarqube_projects p
LEFT JOIN latest_metrics lm ON p.project_key = lm.project_key AND lm.rn = 1
GROUP BY p.project_name
ORDER BY lines_of_code DESC NULLS LAST;

SELECT 
  DATE(recorded_at) as time,
  p.project_name,
  m.metric_value as value
FROM sonarqube_metrics m
JOIN sonarqube_projects p ON m.project_key = p.project_key
WHERE m.metric_key = 'bugs'
  AND $__timeFilter(m.recorded_at)
  AND p.project_key IN (
    SELECT project_key FROM (
      SELECT project_key, SUM(metric_value) as total
      FROM sonarqube_metrics 
      WHERE metric_key = 'bugs' AND recorded_at = (SELECT MAX(recorded_at) FROM sonarqube_metrics)
      GROUP BY project_key ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 10
    ) top
  )
ORDER BY time, p.project_name;

SELECT 
  DATE(recorded_at) as time,
  p.project_name,
  m.metric_value as value
FROM sonarqube_metrics m
JOIN sonarqube_projects p ON m.project_key = p.project_key
WHERE m.metric_key = 'coverage'
  AND $__timeFilter(m.recorded_at)
  AND p.project_key IN (
    SELECT project_key FROM (
      SELECT project_key, AVG(metric_value) as avg_cov
      FROM sonarqube_metrics 
      WHERE metric_key = 'coverage' AND recorded_at = (SELECT MAX(recorded_at) FROM sonarqube_metrics)
      GROUP BY project_key ORDER BY avg_cov ASC LIMIT 10
    ) low
  )
ORDER BY time, p.project_name;

SELECT COUNT(*) as value
FROM repositories r
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM sonarqube_projects sp 
  WHERE sp.project_key ILIKE '%' || r.slug || '%'
     OR sp.project_name ILIKE '%' || r.slug || '%'
);

panels.title: Repos Without SonarQube
panels.description: Number of repositories not configured in SonarQube. These repos have no code quality visibility

targets.rawSql:
WITH repo_coverage AS (
  SELECT r.org, r.slug,
    CASE WHEN EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM sonarqube_projects sp 
      WHERE sp.project_key ILIKE '%' || r.slug || '%'
         OR sp.project_name ILIKE '%' || r.slug || '%'
    ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as has_sonar
  FROM repositories r
)
SELECT ROUND((100.0 * SUM(has_sonar) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0))::numeric, 1) as value
FROM repo_coverage;

panels.title: SonarQube Coverage
panels.description: Percentage of repositories that have SonarQube configured. Target: 100% for full visibility

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM repositories;

panels.title: Total Repositories
panels.description: Total number of repositories in your organization from the repositories table

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) as value
FROM repositories r
WHERE EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM sonarqube_projects sp 
  WHERE sp.project_key ILIKE '%' || r.slug || '%'
     OR sp.project_name ILIKE '%' || r.slug || '%'
);

panels.title: Repos With SonarQube
panels.description: Number of repositories that have matching SonarQube projects configured

targets.rawSql:
SELECT r.org, r.slug, COALESCE(r.language, 'unknown') as language
FROM repositories r
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM sonarqube_projects sp 
  WHERE sp.project_key ILIKE '%' || r.slug || '%'
     OR sp.project_name ILIKE '%' || r.slug || '%'
)
ORDER BY r.org, r.slug;

panels.title: Repos Missing SonarQube
panels.description: List of repositories without SonarQube configuration. Consider adding these to gain code quality visibility

list.definition: SELECT project_name FROM sonarqube_projects ORDER BY project_name
list.label: Project
list.name: project
list.query: SELECT project_name FROM sonarqube_projects ORDER BY project_name

title: SonarQube - Engineering Manager View
